name: Cassius (JustinaY)
description:
Cassius is an AR game centered around the story of a lost girl, Wren, who is struggling to remember her past. But, the one thing she knows is to find her missing friend.

How to Play:

  • Scan chapter cards to spawn the level
    • **You can download and print the card below**
  • Click on bridge/stair icon and tap an empty space or platform to spawn it into the scene
  • Goal is to get to the end of the level

Nicole: Story & Level Design 

https://nicolepolidore.itch.io/

Justina: Programmer & 3D Modeler
